analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x30df4b83225be992179eb2c3f3897dd7d9219336.sol:
	Contract CocacolaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x30df4b83225be992179eb2c3f3897dd7d9219336.sol#104-107)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
